metadata.title: CVE-2023-47993 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A Buffer out-of-bound read vulnerability in Exif.cpp::ReadInt32 inFreeImage 3.18.0 allows attackers to cause a denial-of-service.

criterions.comment: freeimage: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
